titles.title: A joint resolution welcoming President Yunis Khalis and the Delegation of the Islamic Unity of Afghan.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, and passed without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/17/1987--Introduced. Reaffirms U.S. support for the Afghan Resistance Alliance and welcomes the delegation of the Islamic Unity of Afghan mujahideen led by President Mohammad Yunis Khalis.
